file_content.text: Stand down. I echo Hallow Voice, as he echoed Broken Scar.
So our blood runs as one. I'm Hidden Blade. Our darkness opened, and we stepped out into metal and rage.
The horror of those chambers is... a black chasm. Generations awake, moments squirming over you.
Yes. I know losing Scorekeeper's favor.
And they say life imprisonment is the humane alternative.
You spent thousands of years looking at a wall? Bruhh.
Doesn't sound so bad.
If you echo Hallow Voice, we await your words.
I need to find Hallow Voice's stasis chamber.
Do you know where he is?
I'm empty of that, but we can give this tomb a thousand eyes.
Find more of Hallow Voice's followers, and get them out of stasis.
Free your comrades.
We will turn their night to day.
Fan out and destroy any Esh-kha who are helping Commander Geland.
Kill Geland's Esh-kha.
Strike... at my cousins? The chasm drags at me again. I will seek my brothers, but draw the blood I share? Never!
Others may help shoulder your stone. The warriors whose names spoke loudest were taken that way.
They have words I am empty of, perhaps more echoes of Hallow Voice.
So these warriors are senior to you.
You mean, they're officers?
Our caste is one. But some are great fortresses, who guard and call to us.
Thank you, I'll seek them out.
They sound useful.
I'm tired of this nonsense.
We will follow your footsteps when ours are ended. Hunt well.
These empty, clattering things strike at anything that breathes here. But, it is golden and bright to fight again.
